publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Song of Songs 4
ab.l: Muna śeń ḱorkĺuśuń dostqam muna śeń ḱorkĺuśuń ḱoźĺarij ḱoǵurč́uńĺarniń kibik čačyj sartyn čačyj śeniń b́uĺaginiń kibik ol ičkiĺarniń ki taraldylar tavyndan ol Gilʿadnyn.
Tišĺarij b́uĺaginiń kibik ol jazɣy ičkiĺarniń ki čyḥtylar ol juvunmaḥtan ki barlary t́eńĺar da tuvluḥ joḥtur alarɣa.
Ol i- ṕak ip kibik ėrińĺarij śeniń da śoźuj č́eb́ardir keśagi kibik ol narlyḥnyn č́egej śeniń burulɣan čačyj sartyn.
V́ežasy kibik Davidniń bojnuj śeniń qondarylɣan śuńǵuĺarǵa miń ol qalqan taɣylɣan anyn üśt́uńa bar ḱob́aĺari ol baɣaturlarnyn.
Ukšašy ėki t́oš́- ĺarijniń kohen da navi ėki soɣaɣalar kibik ėkiźakĺari kibik jurńuń ol ḱot́uvč́uĺar giĺaflikĺard́a.
Ńegińč́a ki ürgej jeli ol cafonnun da qačarlar ol ḱoĺaǵaĺar barajim öźuḿa ol mušk tavɣa da qajasyna ol Ĺevanonnunĺevonanyn.
Barčej ḱorkĺud́ur śuv́ar uma da ajyp joḥtur śeńd́a.
Birǵaḿa Levanondan t́uǵaĺ uma birǵaḿa Ĺevanondan keĺgiń baḥqyn bašyndan Amananyn bašyndan Śenirnin da Ḥermonnun orunlaryndan aryslanlarnyn tavlaryndan barstlarnyn.
Śuv- d́uj ḿeni siĺlim kala śuvd́u ḿeni birisi byla ḱozĺarijniń bir munǯaḥ byla bojunlaryjdan.
Ńe ḱorkĺud́urĺar śuv́arlikĺarij siĺlim kala ńe jaḥšyraḥtyrlar śuv́arlikĺarij vinadan da ijisi qujušturmaḥlaryjnyn bar otjamlardan.
Nobad kibik tatyjdyrlar ėrińĺarij t́uǵaĺ uma čijbal da śut́ tilij t́ub́uńa da ijsi up- raḥlaryjnyn ijsi kibik Ĺevanonnun,
Baɣ kibik b́okĺańǵań siĺlim kala oba b́eḱĺanǵań ḱoź suv qatyna moɣorlanɣan.
Ińč́ḱa butaḥlaryj sadynyn kibik narlyḥlarnyn ijiśli jemišĺar byla qanforlar nardlar byla.
Nerd da zafran kane da cinamon bar aɣačlary byla ĺevonanyn mušk da sandallar bar iĺk otjamlar byla.
Ḱoź suvu baɣlarnyn qujusu tiri suv- larnyn da aɣyn suvlar Ĺevanondan.

Ojanɣyn jeli cafonnun da keĺgiń
jeli t́emannyn ürǵuń baḥčama aḥsynlar otjamlaryj keĺsiń śuv́arim baɣyna da qabul ėt́siń ijiśli jemišiń jaḥšy kečińuvč́uĺarniń.
